ovdesc.p: This application is used to print account entries for a specified account/ customer between two dates, in the format chosen in the enquiry file.
This application is run with the "V" function.

desc.p: Page break required.
Any alphanumeric type to identify the record.
Sort criteria to be used with the associated enquiry.
Up to 23 type 'A' alphanumeric characters.
Specifies the heading to be used with the STANDARD.HEADING.
Free format text.
Only allowed if standard header is set up.
Denotes whether or not the standard heading is required for this report.
May contain 80 or 132 characters.
This field is reserved for future expansion.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Selection value associated with fields ENQ.SEL.FIELD and ENQ.OPERAND.
Up to 45 type 'A' alphanumeric characters. Associated with field range ENQ.SEL.FIELD to ENQ.OPERAND.
Contains any item from the standard selection record for account, for which criteria is to be specified.
Up to 45 alphanumeric characters. Associated with field range OPERAND to SELECTION.
Must be on the Account standard selection record.
This field is reserved for future expansion.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Contains any valid operand.
Up to 2 type 'A' alphanumeric characters. Associated with field range SELECTION.FIELD to SELECTION.
Must be one of the following: EQ GE GT LE LT LK NE NR RG UL
This field is reserved for future expansion.
This is a NOINPUT field.
This field is reserved for future expansion.
This field is a NOINPUT field.
This field is reserved for future expansion.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Contains any item from the standard selection record for account, with type D I or J.
Up to 23 alphanumeric characters.
Must be on the Account standard selection record.
Specifies the name of the tape being processed, which is the same as the first part of the key.
3-35 type 'A' alphanumeric characters.
Contains the date up to which entries for the account are to be considered.
The date is inclusive and defaults to TODAY.
Up to 10 characters (Date format).
Contains any valid operand.
Up to 2 type 'A' alphanumeric characters. Associated with field range ENQ.SEL.FIELD to ENQ.SEL.
Must be one of the following: EQ GE GT LE LT LK NE NR RG UL
Selection value associated with fields ENQ.OPERAND and ENQ.SEL.
Up to 45 type 'A' alphanumeric characters. Associated with field range ENQ.OPERAND to ENQ.SEL.
Must be specified as a field in the associated ENQUIRY record.
Contains the date from which entries for the account are required.
The date is inclusive.
Up to 10 characters (Date format). (Mandatory input)
This field is reserved for future expansion.
This is a NOINPUT field.
Selection value associated with field range SELECTION.FIELD to OPERAND.
Up to 45 type 'A' alphanumeric characters. Associated with field range SELECTION.FIELD to OPERAND.
Contains the ID of the report control record which is to be used in order to spool the requested details.
Up to 35 type 'A' alphanumeric characters. Mandatory Input.
Must be the id to an existing report control record.
Contains the enquiry record which is to be used to print the report.
1 to 32 type 'A' alphanumeric characters. Mandatory Input.
Must exist on the file ENQUIRY.
Specifies the file to be selected.
ACCOUNT or ACCOUNT$HIS. (Mandatory input).
